name: Vector Ninja
description:
Enter abandoned space station that was captured by alien robots and find out what happened there!

Fight with your enemies like real cyber ninja. Show your enemies no mercy
at all! Vector Ninja is very simple arcade action game where your only mission is to free the
space station from invaders. Kill as much enemies as it is possible and earn cash to buy
upgrades to become even deadly and dangerous!
Vector Ninja game features:
- Furious action
- Exciting gameplay
- Astonishing HD graphics
- Cyber ninja and alien droids

If you are a fan of fast and easy action games then Vector Ninja is just perfect for you!
Become the deadly shadow and bring nightmares on your enemies and take that space
station back! Good luck!
